response.overview: RADIOHEAD The Bends (Official 2009 UK EMI 'Collectors Edition' promotional 3-disc set comprising 2 x CD-R acetates and 1 DVD-R acetate. Originally released in March 1995, this collectors edition of 'The Bends' comprises the 12-track CD album featuring the singles 'My Iron Lung', 'High And Dry', 'Fake Plastic Trees', 'Just' & 'Street Spirit [Fade Out]', and comes expanded with a Bonus 21-track CD ccontaining EPs with rarities and a 1994 BBC Radio session; plus a Bonus DVD including 5 music videos, 1995 and '96 TV performances from 'Top Of The Pops', 'Later with Jools Holland' and '2 Meter Session', and eight filmed performances from their May 1994 London Astoria concert. The custom printed CD-Rs are housed with a fold-out tracklisting insert and the DVD-R is housed in a custom stickered clear wallet).
response.title: Radiohead The Bends
